entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Webequie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lansdowne House Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
